About Ansell guardian® partner

Ansell Guardian® Partner provides digital tools to help companies select the right PPE solution to improve their safety, productivity and cost performance.

Chemical protection simplified

  • Quick access to chemical permeation data for the most common chemicals (including ASTM, EN and ISO standards)
  • Search for hand protection and body protection solutions
  • Advanced access to chemical permeation data and the possibility to save, download and email your individual reports
  • Please register here
  • Customised on-site assessment to discuss your individual safety and busintess performance needs
  • Please contact us here
  • Quick access to chemical permeation data for the most common chemicals (including ASTM, EN and ISO standards)
  • Search for hand protection and body protection solutions

The tool features a simple and intuitive user interface and is accessible on desktops, tablets and mobile devices.

This how it works

An extensive selection of smart features

PERMEATION TIMES

Easy-to-read legend on permeation breakthrough times

DEGRADATION CLASSES

Easy-to-read legend on degradation classes

PRODUCT DETAILS

Access product information and specification details

CUSTOMIZED REPORTS

Ability to save and download visual reports (registration required)

SELECTION CRITERIA

Search by chemical name or CAS number

Search by product name or material type

SIMPLE VISUALISATION

Colour-coded visual charts to ease selection

EASY-TO-READ LEGEND

Interactive pop-up banner to inform on permeation times and degradation classes

PERMEATION and DEGRADATION VIEWS

Toggle feature to view both permeation and degradation
